firstTimeModal.title: Compare Smart, Shop Smart – How CalcPrice Helps You Save

item1.title: Smart and Simple Comparison
item1.description: No more guessing which package size is the best deal. The app calculates the price per 100g/ml/unit so you can clearly see what is the most cost-effective.

item2.title: Save Money
item2.description: Confusing prices? With CalcPrice, you can choose the cheapest option and avoid misleading packaging sizes.

item3.title: Suitable for All Products
item3.description: Cornflakes, cheese, drinks, cleaning products, shampoo – anything sold by weight, volume, or unit.

item4.title: Fast and Easy to Use
item4.description: No need for calculators or complicated math. Just enter the data and get an instant answer.

item5.title: Smart Ranking
item5.description: Not only will you see the price per 100g/ml/unit, but you can also compare it to other products entered to know if it's truly a good deal.
